text:
Currently name resource selector of <restrict> task to allow matching name patterns independent of OS file separator.

As suggested by Stefan at

http://www.nabble.com/OS-Independent-file-strings-in-resourcecollections-td25486284.html#a25489043

it would be nice to provide handleDirSep attribute to Name selector and keep the this flag true by default.

Also, it may be good idea to enforce all the matches against the file happen independent of os path.

Regards,
Raja Nagendra Kumar,
C.T.O
www.tejasoft.com
creator: nagendra.raja@tejasoft.com
